alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Prairie; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 9:15PM CDT until April 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Prairie County in central Arkansas... Northern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... South central White County in central Arkansas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 913 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thurman, or 12 miles west of Des Arc, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Des Arc... Thurman... Vinity Corner... Jasmine... Hayley... Butlerville... Hickory Plains... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and eastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and eastern Arkansas.
